title: The Plot Thickens
description: A Hollywood stuntman is shot four times in his own home and left to die. Who would want him dead?  And the most stunning twist in this Dateline classic is what didn’t happen. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on September 28, 2012.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
